top_rare_diseases.overview: Alport Syndrome is a rare genetic disorder characterized by kidney disease, hearing loss, and eye abnormalities.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Genetic mutations in the COL4A3, COL4A4, or COL4A5 genes
top_rare_diseases.diagnosis: Genetic testing, kidney biopsy, and clinical evaluation
top_rare_diseases.treatment: ACE inhibitors, ARBs, and supportive care

top_rare_diseases.overview: FSGS is a rare kidney disease characterized by scarring of the glomeruli.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Genetic mutations, infections, and adaptive responses to injury
top_rare_diseases.treatment: ACE inhibitors, ARBs, and immunosuppressive therapy

top_rare_diseases.overview: IgA Nephropathy is a rare kidney disease characterized by deposits of IgA antibodies in the glomeruli.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Abnormal IgA antibody production and deposition
top_rare_diseases.treatment: ACE inhibitors, ARBs, and immunosuppressive therapy

top_rare_diseases.overview: Membranous Nephropathy is a rare kidney disease characterized by thickening of the glomerular basement membrane.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Autoantibodies against M-type phospholipase A2 receptor
top_rare_diseases.treatment: ACE inhibitors, ARBs, and immunosuppressive therapy

top_rare_diseases.overview: HSP is a rare vasculitis characterized by IgA deposits in small blood vessels.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Abnormal IgA antibody production and deposition
